snippet.title: Computer Scrabble (1985) - Amstrad CPC Gameplay
snippet.description:
Leisure Genius released their own adaptation of Scrabble to many home computers, including the Amstrad CPC version you see here.

Scrabble (C) Mattel
Developed by Psion Software
Published by Leisure Genius
Also released for Apple II, Thomston MO/TO, Tatung Einstein, Sinclair QL, BBC Micro, Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum (Not to be confused with the 1983 version by Sinclair Research) and MSX

#amstrad #retrogames #retrogaming #amstradcpc #amstradcpcgames #amstradgaming #amstradcpc464 #leisuregenius #theforeseenarcade #scrabble
